row.ingredients_en: flour; salt; oil; laurel; butter; wine; spinach; potato
row.ingredient_list: filetes de hígado; harina; sal; aceite; una hoja de laurel, 50 gramos de manteca; un vaso de vino Marsala; espinacas cocidas; papas cocidas
row.ingredient_list_en: liver fillets; flour; salt; oil; a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter; a glass of Marsala wine; cooked spinach; lard; cooked potatoes
row.directions: Cortar unos filetes de hígado tacándole la telita y los nervios y pasarlos por harina y condimentar con sal.; Poner en una sartén media tacita de aceite, calentar bien y dorar los bises; agregarles después una hoja de laurel, 50 gramos de manteca, un vaso de vino Marsala, tapar y dejar hervir despacito hasta que los filetes estén cocidos y la salsa reducida.; Servirlos acompañados con espinacas cocidas y rociadas con manteca y papas cocidas.
row.directions_en: Cut some liver fillets by touching the telita and nerves and pass them through flour and season with salt.; Put in a frying pan half a cup of oil, heat well and brown the encores; then add a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter, a glass of Marsala wine, cover and let it boil slowly until the fillets are cooked and the sauce reduced.; Serve them accompanied with cooked spinach and drizzled with butter and cooked potatoes.
row.title: filetes de higado
